name: Ritu Mehta
bio:
I have deep interests in graphic design and hence dealt with graphic design applications. My tech skills include Front-End development, graphic designing and DSA. I have a great interest in silent reading and writing and hence spends a part of my day on medium.com. I am a sport enthusiast which makes me a basketball player and enhanced my ability to work in a team.
   I can spend hours being alone with nature.
